p: The previous investigations also show two novel C 29-5 β-sterols, opuntisterol[(24R)-24-ethyl-5 β-choles- 9-ene-6 β, 12α-diol] and opuntisteroside [(24R)-24-ethyl 6 β-[( βd-glucopyranosyl)oxy]-5 β-cholest-9-ene-12α-ol], together with nine known compounds, β-sitosterol, taraxerol, friedelin, methyl linoleate, 7-oxositosterol, 6 β-hydrox ystigmast-4-ene-3-one, daucosterol, methyl eucomate and eucomic acid, were isolated from the stems of OD collected in Guizhou Province, China [ 20].
